banner.title: WELCOME TO KIM HAO TRANSPORT TRADING COMPANY LIMITED
banner.description: KIM HAO TRANSPORT TRADING COMPANY LIMITED is one of the leading companies in the transport and logistics industry. Kim Hao provides a variety of transport and logistics solutions, including international transport and logistics, domestic distribution, and supply chain logistics support. We deliver goods quickly, safely, and on time worldwide.

about.title: KIM HAO TRANSPORT TRADING COMPANY LIMITED
about.description: KIM HAO TRANSPORT TRADING COMPANY LIMITED was established in 2025, with its headquarters in Vietnam. We are developing to become one of the largest transport and logistics service companies, fully trusted by the IATA association. We have a branch system in most continents such as America, Asia, Europe, Australia... and hundreds of agents in major cities worldwide, aiming to provide the most convenient conditions for quality service control and cargo safety.

list.title: SEA TRANSPORT
list.description: KIM HAO TRANSPORT TRADING COMPANY LIMITED is one of the largest NVOCCs in Vietnam, with over 30 years of experience in sea transport, including LCL (less than container load) and FCL (full container load).

list.title: AIR TRANSPORT
list.description: KIM HAO TRANSPORT TRADING COMPANY LIMITED is proud to be a member of the International Air Transport Association (IATA), with extensive experience in air cargo transport.

list.title: WAREHOUSING SERVICES
list.description: Currently operating service warehouses and bonded warehouses in the center of Ho Chi Minh City and neighboring areas such as Bien Hoa, Dong Nai, Nhon Trach, etc.

list.title: CUSTOMS SERVICES
list.description: Over 20 years of experience working and handling customs procedures in Vietnam.

list.title: DOMESTIC TRANSPORT
list.description: Owns a nationwide network of small trucks and containers.

list.title: SORTING AND PACKAGING
list.description: Equipped with a comprehensive warehouse management information system that can provide complete supply chain logistics solutions for customers.

management.title: MANAGEMENT SYSTEM
management.subtitle: Streamline your business operations with our comprehensive management solution

about.title: About - KIM HAO TRANSPORT TRADING COMPANY LIMITED
about.metaDescription: About KIM HAO TRANSPORT TRADING COMPANY LIMITED

sections.intro1: KIM HAO TRANSPORT TRADING COMPANY LIMITED was established in 2025, with its headquarters in Vietnam. We are developing to become one of the largest transport and logistics service companies, fully trusted by the IATA association. We have a branch system in most continents such as America, Asia, Europe, Australia... and hundreds of agents in major cities worldwide, aiming to provide the most convenient conditions for quality service control and cargo safety.
sections.intro2: KIM HAO TRANSPORT TRADING COMPANY LIMITED is a comprehensive logistics company. We provide optimized services with a complete "end-to-end" supply chain to save customers' time when choosing a full-service carrier. We can provide customers with integrated transport and logistics solutions, capable of handling shipments from the smallest to the largest to any location worldwide, with full responsibility from arranging safe transport for each shipment to other logistics services such as packaging, warehousing, and distribution.
sections.motto: Our motto is to always focus on customer needs, dedicate ourselves, save costs, and deliver on time. Therefore, we ensure that KIM HAO TRANSPORT TRADING COMPANY LIMITED VIETNAM can meet all transport and logistics needs of your company anytime and anywhere in the world at the most reasonable prices.

hoat-dong-KH.title: KIM HAO TRANSPORT TRADING COMPANY LIMITED 2025 NEW YEAR PARTY

sections.content: In the warm atmosphere of the early spring days, KIM HAO TRANSPORT TRADING COMPANY LIMITED VIETNAM organized the 2025 New Year party to welcome the new office in Hanoi headquarters as well as mark a new year full of excitement and connection among company members.

sections.title: Highlights of KIM HAO TRANSPORT TRADING COMPANY LIMITED VIETNAM's 2025 New Year Party
sections.content: On March 14, 2025, members of the "common home" KIM HAO TRANSPORT TRADING COMPANY LIMITED VIETNAM worked together to decorate every corner of the party space. With a grand stage, colorful balloons, and meticulous tables with elegant fresh flowers, the atmosphere was joyful and exciting.
The party became more lively with attractive performances by company members such as modern dance, music, and contemporary dance.
Throughout the party, we took many group photos to capture meaningful moments.

To liven up the atmosphere and bring relaxing moments, we participated in games and a lottery program with attractive prizes, along with the recognition of outstanding individuals who have long been with the company. The enthusiasm of the members contributed to creating a cozy, friendly, and fun space.

sections.title: Message and Inspiration from KIM HAO TRANSPORT TRADING COMPANY LIMITED's 2025 New Year Party
sections.content: It can be said that the New Year party was not only a memorable event but also a testament to the love and solidarity that all employees have for each other. Through this party, Logistics VietNam Company wants to inspire continuous innovation and creativity, daring to challenge and break through to succeed more in 2025.

jobDescription.title: Job Description:
items: Track the sales targets assigned to the team and personal targets set by management
Develop sales plans, train new sales representatives
Organize and coordinate sales representatives' schedules
Supervise sales representatives, support them in achieving and exceeding targets
Provide transport and logistics services and core logistics services
Regularly seek new customers and take care of existing customers
Develop and maintain trusting relationships with customers
Manage customer contracts and quotation processes
Resolve any customer issues and complaints

requirements.title: Requirements:
items: Education: College degree or higher
2-3 years of experience in Logistics/Import-Export business activities
Having existing customer sources is an advantage
Good communication skills, quick-witted, articulate
Ability to work in a team, share with the collective
Passionate about business, enthusiastic, proactive
English is a mandatory foreign language
Report to the Sales Manager

benefits.title: Benefits:
items: Modern, professional, friendly working environment
Social insurance, health insurance, unemployment insurance according to Vietnamese law
Allowances and 13th-month bonus, birthday gifts, annual leave, annual travel
Annual health check
Birthday bonus, holiday bonus
Health insurance
